entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
